_comment: SCENARIO TEMPLATE - This file documents the expected structure for scenario JSON files.
_instructions: Copy this file, remove all _comment fields, and fill in actual values.

environment._comment: Defines the simulation grid and its contents.
environment._width_comment: Required. Positive integer. Grid width in cells.
environment._height_comment: Required. Positive integer. Grid height in cells.
environment._obstacles_comment: Optional. Array of [x, y] positions. Cells robots cannot occupy.

zones._id_comment: Required. Non-negative integer. Must be unique across all zones.
zones._type_comment: Required. One of: inspection, maintenance, loading, restricted, charging.
zones._positions_comment: Required. Non-empty array of [x, y] positions that this zone covers.

environment._zones_comment: Optional. Array of zone objects defining typed regions in the environment.

_zone_types._comment: Reference for available zone types and their typical use cases.
_zone_types.inspection: Areas where robots perform inspection tasks.
_zone_types.maintenance: Areas for robot maintenance or repair.
_zone_types.loading: Areas for loading/unloading cargo or materials.
_zone_types.restricted: Areas robots should avoid or require special permissions to enter.
_zone_types.charging: Areas where robots can recharge their batteries.
